div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2327 Granada (anc. Iliberris), 1925 (453) Burial: 218-213 B.C. (Villaronga) Contents: 40+ AR Hispano-Punic: 1 tetradr. (as Robinson 4) 40 didr. (as R. 7d, e, f, i) Roman Rep.: 1 quadrig. Disposition: Madrid (Instituto Valencia de Don Juan) 1 Gomez-Moreno, Miscelaneas (Madrid, 1949), p. 175, illus. Crawford, RRCH 33 Villaronga, MHC (forthcoming)
